name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust backend systems, specializing in financial applications, machine learning algorithms, and cloud-native solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Postgres**, and adept in implementing **Test Driven Development** methodologies including **Unit Testing** and **Integration Testing**. Experienced with containerization and orchestration technologies such as **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Demonstrated capability in deploying applications on **Gcloud** and navigating complex databases, including **MongoDB**, **Cassandra**, and **Astra-DB**. Strong background in delivering impactful projects for reputable organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, leveraging a solid foundation in mathematics and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Develop and maintain robust backend services using **Java** and **Spring Boot** to enhance document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Implement Test Driven Development (TDD) methodologies and perform Unit Testing and Integration Testing to guarantee high-quality code and seamless functionality.
Utilize **Postgres** for efficient database management and storage solutions, ensuring data integrity and performance.
Containerize applications using **Docker** and orchestrate them with **Kubernetes** for scalable deployment and management in cloud environments.
Leverage **Gcloud** to deploy and manage applications, enhancing cloud operations and ensuring security.
Engage in cross-functional collaboration to resolve integration challenges and ensure compliance with project specifications.
Analyze financial data using basics of **Machine Learning** and **Mathematics** to deliver data-driven insights within the project timelines.
Monitor and optimize application performance, ensuring that operational metrics meet defined targets with at least **90%** uptime.

• Developed robust backend systems using **Java** and **Spring Boot** to automate document workflows, focusing on Test Driven Development (TDD) principles and ensuring high-quality code through Unit Testing and Integration Testing.
• Engineered and managed containerized microservices with **Docker** and deployed on **Kubernetes**, achieving a reduction in deployment time by **30%**.
• Utilized **Postgres** for efficient data management and advanced querying capabilities, successfully optimizing database performance by **25%**.
• Collaborated with finance teams to build automated solutions for complex reporting processes, incorporating principles of **Machine Learning** and advanced **Mathematics** to analyze financial data effectively.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines to support seamless application integration, leading to a **40%** reduction in release cycle times.
• Conducted security audits and integrated **OAuth2** for secure user authentication and access management, ensuring compliance with regulatory frameworks.
• Worked alongside cross-functional teams to drive successful system integration, leveraging cloud services like **Gcloud** for enhanced scalability and reliability.
• Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions to promote knowledge sharing and team growth, fostering a collaborative work environment.

• Developed scalable backend services using **Java** and **Spring Boot** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations by processing over **10,000** transactions per minute.
• Implemented Test Driven Development (TDD) practices with **JUnit** and **Mockito** to ensure reliability through robust Unit Testing and Integration Testing, achieving a **95%** test coverage.
• Managed databases effectively using **PostgreSQL**, ensuring data integrity and performance for high-volume financial transactions.
• Employed **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for container orchestration and deployment, streamlining operations with an **80%** reduction in deployment times.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through REST APIs and WebSocket channels, resulting in a **30%** improvement in user interaction speed on the platform.
• Introduced machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics in finance, enhancing decision-making processes.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, while adhering to internal data security protocols, maintaining a **100%** compliance rate.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, tox, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management.
